text: s ended.    - Five types of standard treatment are used:         - Surgery     - Radiation therapy     - Chemotherapy     - Biologic therapy     - High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue        - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.         - Targeted therapy        - Patients may want to think about taking part in a clinical trial.    - Patients can enter clinical trials before, during, or after starting their cancer treatment.    - Follow-up tests may be needed.
